description: This upper garment features an asymmetric top with long sleeves and an asymmetric neckline. The design includes a narrow waistband, creating a fitted silhouette. The different panels of the garment are connected in an asymmetrical fashion, with the sleeve seams aligning differently on each side to complement the irregular neckline. The waistband is joined seamlessly to the main body panel, providing structure to the garment. The stitching details highlight the unique cut and fit of the piece, focusing on the asymmetry and tailored finish.
occasion: This upper garment is ideal for a contemporary art gallery opening, where its asymmetric neckline and design will complement the modern, creative atmosphere.
